name: Flappy Hero: Wills
description:
Flappy Hero is a platform, action, arcade and roguelike game all wrapped in one! Beat it the first time through with just one finger!

Make your way across the island however you want to save the princess.

Beat levels to earn gold: the more gold, the more heroes you can buy and the faster your tower is built.

The tower gives you a starter bonus and unlocks new parts of the island.

Enemies, chests and items randomly appear on levels. Chests contain items that help beat levels, and there are different types of enemies, each with their own unique features.

Open all chests and get cool weapons!

Attack, dodge, and charge headlong into battle: you must defeat all enemies, and there sure are a lot of them!

The game works offline, so you can relax and play anywhere, any time!

Fulfill your duty and save the princess!
